body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us. My name is Adam Hall, and I represent Luxe Cars Inc. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Ashley. Could you please provide your phone number as well as your email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, two three four, one zero zero zero. And my email is ashley.washington@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Ashley. Could you also confirm your mailing address for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Certainly. My address is one two three Main Street, Anytown, USA.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that with us. We'll update our records accordingly. Is there anything specific you would like assistance with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I'm experiencing some frustration with the inventory availability on your website.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I see, I apologize for the inconvenience. We'll look into that matter promptly and get back to you with a resolution. Thank you for bringing it to our attention, Ashley. We appreciate your patience.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time today. Have a great day, Ashley. Goodbye.
